sentences.english: An oil tanker drove through Hengshan County, Shaanxi Province, China, Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 一輛油罐車穿行陝西省橫山縣。

sentences.english: The owner of "New Store" Stationery Store came to Hengshan Township from other county.
sentences.chinese: 新店文具印刷行的老闆是從外地到橫山鄉落腳。

sentences.english: That's why "New Store" Stationery Store was built up!
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，一家新開的文具店在橫山鄉開張了。
